name: Ithos

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally C. RATE in the Arena by 33%.

skills.name: Gouge
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of granting an Extra Turn. Decreases enemy MAX HP by 15% of damage dealt.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Outburst
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies 3 times. Places a 15% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Extinguish Life
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. This attack is always critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
